name: PT Boat Gunner - River Warfare Patrol Duty Simulator Game FREE
name_original: PT Boat Gunner - River Warfare Patrol Duty Simulator Game FREE
description:
Experience the excitement of being a river boat gunner in Southeast Asia in the 1960s. Defend your boat against all sort of land and water based attacks. Upgrade your gun, use rockets and destroy the enemy. Real Military Naval action on the go.

Features
-3 High Quality 3D environments
-Several different guns
-In Game weapon upgrades
-Rocket powerups
